Text:
Hi. do you have any of these books? Thanks in advance,
1. Armstrong's Handbook of Reward Management Practice: Improving Performance through Reward [Paperback] 2012 edition
2. HR From Outside In
3. The new standards methods for linking business performance and executive incentive pay
4. Proving the value of HR how and why to measure ROI
5. Statistics for compensation
6. Executive compensation: Bruce Ellig
7. Fair pay fair play
